import React from "react"; import Faq from "../layout/Faq"; const About = () => { return (

About Us

Freshbox is a logistics company that is funded by passionate and mission drivien people. Our goal is to simplify supply chain process and get food from farmers to consumers efficiently with minimal to 0 waste. Join us in this mission.

Why FreshBox

Every Year in the US, $160 Billion worth of fresh produce is wasted. This is largely due to inefficient supply chain practices, logistics and distribution channels.

We belive that we can build 0 waste future by removing all barriers between consumers and farmers, use technology to predict demand for produce in advance and simplify supply chain processes.

); }; export default About;
